special_powers.name: COOL BUT CRUDE
special_powers.description: Raphael can use Battle Fury and Shape Change.

special_powers.name: LOCK BLADES
special_powers.description: Raphael can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. Adjacent opposing characters can't use Blades/Claws/Fangs.

special_powers.name: PARTY DUDE
special_powers.description: When Michelangelo or another friendly character with the TMNT keyword makes an attack, attack rolls of 11 are also critical hits.

special_powers.name: SEWER SKATING
special_powers.description: If Michelangelo is indoors, he can use Hypersonic Speed. If he's outdoors, he can use Sidestep.

special_powers.name: DOES MACHINES
special_powers.description: Give Donatello a power action when he is adjacent to an object or a character holding an object. Remove that object from the game and all friendly characters with the TMNT keyword modify their attack values by +1 until one of those characters hits an opposing character.

special_powers.name: BRAINS OF THE BUNCH
special_powers.description: Donatello can use Outwit. When he does, roll a d6. 5-6: Donatello can use Outwit a second time this turn, targeting the same character.

special_powers.name: LEADS
special_powers.description: Leonardo can use Leadership. When he does and succeeds, modify the defense value of one friendly character with the TMNT keyword by +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: TWIN KATANAS
special_powers.description: Leonardo can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. When he does, he may instead roll 2d6 and choose one as the result.

special_powers.name: BODY CHECK OR SLAPSHOT?
special_powers.description: Give Casey Jones a free action and choose Close Combat Expert or Ranged Combat Expert. Casey Jones can use that power until you choose again.

special_powers.name: 500 YEARS OF FOOT TRADITION
special_powers.description: Foot Ninja can use Sidestep and Stealth.

special_powers.name: KATAR: PENETRATING DAGGER
special_powers.description: Foot Ninja can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. When Foot Ninja makes a close attack while occupying Hindering Terrain, the damage dealt is penetrating.

special_powers.name: 500 YEARS OF FOOT TRADITION
special_powers.description: Foot Ninja can use Sidestep and Stealth.

special_powers.name: THREE-SEGMENT STAFF
special_powers.description: Give Foot Ninja a power action. Make a close attack targeting up to three adjacent opposing characters. Hit characters are each dealt 1 damage instead of normal damage and given an action token.

special_powers.name: 500 YEARS OF FOOT TRADITION
special_powers.description: Foot Ninja can use Sidestep and Stealth.

special_powers.name: SHURIKEN: WEAPON OF DISTRACTION
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - When Foot Ninja hits with a range attack, hit characters modify their attack and defense values by -1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: 500 YEARS OF FOOT TRADITION
special_powers.description: Foot Ninja can use Sidestep and Stealth.

special_powers.name: TWIN KATANAS
special_powers.description: Foot Ninja can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. When he does, he may instead roll 2d6 and choose one as the result.

special_powers.name: EXTREMELY TOUGH HIDE
special_powers.description: Triceraton can use Toughness and takes a maximum of 2 damage from attacks.

special_powers.name: THE WORLD NEEDS TO KNOW: YOUR CRIMES
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose an opposing character within 4 squares and line of fire. Until your next turn, that character subtracts 2 from its break away rolls.

special_powers.name: IRMA?
special_powers.description: If Irma is 25 points, she is KO'd if she crosses the red KO line. If Irma is 60 points, she is not KO'd when she crosses the red KO line.

special_powers.name: HIDDEN KRAANG SUBPRIME
special_powers.description: STOP - Irma can use Invulnerability.

special_powers.name: THAT'S JUST IRMA
special_powers.description: Irma can use Perplex and doesn't block friendly characters' line of fire.

special_powers.name: RUNNING FROM THE FEDERATION AND TRICERATONS FOR YEARS
special_powers.description: Fugitoid can use Energy Shield/Deflection and Stealth. When an attack misses Fugitoid, after actions resolve you may place him up to 3 squares away from his current square.

special_powers.name: INVENTOR OF THE TRANSMAT
special_powers.description: Fugitoid can use Phasing/Teleport with a speed value of 12. When he does, he can use the Carry ability to carry up to 4 characters, but only those that share a keyword with him.

special_powers.name: SACRIFICIAL DAGGER
special_powers.description: Chien Khan can use Blades/Claws/Fangs and Steal Energy. When Chien Khan KO's an opposing character, after actions resolve, heal him 2 clicks.

special_powers.name: OPEN A GATE TO THE WORLD OF THE ONI
special_powers.description: Once per game, when Chien Khan KO's an opposing character, after actions resolve, you may place a Noi Tai Dar, Great Oni bystander as described on this card in the KO'd character's square.

special_powers.name: FAST DEADLY SHADOWS
special_powers.description: Squirrelanoid can use Charge, Flurry, and Stealth.

special_powers.name: SO MY PART OF THE PLAN WAS WHAT?
special_powers.description: If a friendly character named Shredder is on the map, Bebop can use Willpower. Friendly characters named Shredder or Rocksteady can use Enhancement, but only to modify characters named Bebop or Rocksteady.

special_powers.name: UH... DID I SCREW UP AGAIN?
special_powers.description: Once per turn when Bebop misses an attack, put an Incompetent Idiot token on this card. Give Bebop a free action and remove 2 Incompetent Idiot tokens to heal another friendly character that shares a keyword 2 clicks.

special_powers.name: UH... WHAT WAS I SUPPOSED TO BE DOING?
special_powers.description: If a friendly character named Shredder is on the map, Rocksteady can use Willpower.  Friendly characters named Shredder or Bebop can use Empower, but only to modify characters named Bebop or Rocksteady.

special_powers.name: MISSED IT BY THAAAAAT MUCH
special_powers.description: Once per turn when Rocksteady misses an attack, put a Mutant Moron token on this card. Give Rocksteady a free action and remove 2 Mutant Moron tokens to remove all action tokens from another friendly character that shares a keyword.

special_powers.name: THERMITE GRENADE
special_powers.description: When Shredder is KO'd from an attack, deal 3 penetrating damage to all characters within 3 squares, and on the same elevation, of the square that he last occupied.

special_powers.name: YOU CANNOT BEAT ME, EVEN FOUR TO ONE
special_powers.description: Shredder modifies his defense value by +1 for each opposing character within 3 squares.

special_powers.name: HEAD OF THE NEW YORK BRANCH OF THE FOOT
special_powers.description: Shredder can use Leadership. When he does and succeeds, instead of removing one action token, remove an action token from up to 2 adjacent friendly characters with the Foot Clan keyword regardless of point value.

special_powers.name: RAT NO MORE
special_powers.description: Splinter can use Shape Change. If Splinter has been attacked, that opponent's force can't make attacks this turn.

special_powers.name: TUNDRA STALKER
special_powers.description: Alopex can use Sidestep and Stealth. When Alopex attacks an opposing character that isn't the highest point value on its force, modify her attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: YOUR ARMOR MAKES YOU WEAK
special_powers.description: When Alopex hits an opposing character with an attack and the damage is reduced, modify that character's attack value by -2 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: LEONARDO, MY... RIVAL
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - When Karai is adjacent to a friendly character named Leonardo, modify their attack values by +1.

special_powers.name: THE SHREDDER BLUFF
special_powers.description: STOP - Karai can use Close Combat Expert. Once per game, give Karai a free action to make a range attack. If she hits, instead of normal damage, deal the hit target penetrating damage equal to your attack total minus the target's defense value (minimum 1).

special_powers.name: THROWING MY WEIGHT AROUND
special_powers.description: Slash can use Charge and Improved Movement: Destroy Blocking.

special_powers.name: JUST YOU AND ME AGAINST THE WORLD, RAPH
special_powers.description: Slash can use Close Combat Expert and Empower.  UNIQUE MODIFIER - Adjacent friendly characters named Raphael modify their attack and defense values by +1.

special_powers.name: THE SKULL COMMANDS ME
special_powers.description: When another friendly character KO's an opposing character, place a Skull token on this card. Once per turn you may remove a Skull token to give Zog a move, close combat, or range combat action as a free action with his speed and attack values modified by -1.

special_powers.name: CAN'T GET PINNED DOWN, COMMANDER ZORAPH
special_powers.description: Zog can use Charge. When he does and begins the action adjacent to a friendly character named Raphael, modify his speed value by +3.

special_powers.name: EXTREMELY TOUGH HIDE
special_powers.description: Zog can use Invulnerability and takes a maximum of 2 damage from attacks.

special_powers.name: RATS EVERYWHERE... I AM EVERYWHERE
special_powers.description: Give Rat King a free action if he occupies hindering terrain. Place him in another square of hindering terrain within 6 squares.

special_powers.name: PAWNS IN MY GAME
special_powers.description: Rat King can use Stealth. He can use Mind Control as if he had a range value of 6 and when he does, he can use Improved Targeting: Elevated, Hindering, Blocking, Characters.

special_powers.name: GAME FOR THE WORLD
special_powers.description: Rat King can use Perplex and Probability Control.

special_powers.name: TURTLE POWER
special_powers.description: Donatello can use Stealth and Toughness.

special_powers.name: RIDE THE BO
special_powers.description: When Donatello hits an opposing character, after actions resolve you may place that character within Donatello's range and line of fire.

special_powers.name: TEEN TURTLE INTELLECT
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, choose one: Outwit, Perplex, or Support. Donatello can use the chosen power until your next turn.

special_powers.name: TURTLE POWER
special_powers.description: Leonardo can use Stealth and Toughness.

special_powers.name: BORN TO LEAD, GROOMED TO SUCCEED
special_powers.description: Leonardo can use Leadership. When he does, increase the result by 1 for each adjacent friendly character with the TMNT keyword.

special_powers.name: TURTLE POWER
special_powers.description: Raphael can use Stealth and Toughness.

special_powers.name: THAT ALL YOU GOT?
special_powers.description: Raphael can use Empower. Whenever Raphael is missed by an attack, remove an action token from him. If you can't, modify the attacker's defense value by -1 until the end of your next turn.

special_powers.name: TURTLE POWER
special_powers.description: Michelangelo can use Stealth and Toughness.

special_powers.name: YOU GONNA HIT WHO?
special_powers.description: Michelangelo can use Combat Reflexes and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: TAKE US WHEN AND WHERE WE NEED TO GO!
special_powers.description: Renet Tilley can use Phasing/Teleport and Sidestep. She can use the Carry ability and when she does, can carry up to 4 characters.

special_powers.name: SCEPTER OF THE SANDS OF TIME
special_powers.description: Renet Tilley can use Probability Control regardless of range and line of fire.

special_powers.name: BEWARE HIS TAIL!
special_powers.description: Give Armaggon a free action when he has two action tokens to make a close attack.

special_powers.name: FUTURE SHARK
special_powers.description: Armaggon can use Probability Control. He can use it normally, or he can use it twice on your turn, but only to target himself.

special_powers.name: NON-ESSENTIAL PARTS
special_powers.description: Once per game, when Kraang Subprime would take damage, you may instead place an Autonomous Head bystander as described on the card within 3 squares and line of fire. When he does, modify his attack by -1 for the rest of the game.

special_powers.name: MULTIPLE TENTACLES
special_powers.description: Kraang Subprime can use Force Blast, Plasticity, and Running Shot.

special_powers.name: SHRINK TO SAVE YOURSELF!
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose one to last until your next turn. Griddex has Giant Damage Symbol; -or- Griddex has Tiny Damage Symbol but can't make attacks.

special_powers.name: POUND, CRUSH, SMASH
special_powers.description: Griddex can use Super Strength. When he makes a close object attack and hits, after actions resolve he may make a close attack targeting the hit character.

special_powers.name: ABILITY TO CHANGE AND FLOW AND IMITATE
special_powers.description: Blobboid can use Plasticity and Shape Change.

special_powers.name: MELT AND REFORM FOR COMBAT CONFIGURATION
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose one to last until you choose again. Blobboid can use Close Combat Expert and Combat Reflexes; -or- Blobboid can use Ranged Combat Expert and Energy Shield/Deflection.

special_powers.name: ZAPPOWER!
special_powers.description: Shellectro can use Energy Explosion. When he does, hit characters are knocked back 3 squares.

special_powers.name: COUNTER FORCE BOLT
special_powers.description: When Shellectro hits with a range attack, choose one hit opposing character. That character can't make range attacks until your next turn.

special_powers.name: GRAVITY WHIP FLING
special_powers.description: When Graviturtle hits an opposing character, give that character an action token and it can't make close attacks until your next turn.

special_powers.name: SUPER TURTLES, COUNT IT OFF!
special_powers.description: Once per turn, when an adjacent friendly character with the TMNT keyword hits an opposing character, after actions resolve, you may roll a d6. On a result of 4 - 6, remove an action token from that friendly character.
